text: now as the year draws to a close I know
I begin to think back to the events and
people who brought us the headlines this
year and one man who will surely stick
with many of us is this politician the
mayor of Toronto Rob Ford he's been
talked about to such an extent that
Google in his native Canada say mr. Ford
is the most searched term of 2013 now as
you probably know it's not been a great
year for mr. mayor he's admitted to
smoking crack cocaine and buying illegal
drugs but it's nice to see he can still
enjoy himself despite the waves of
pressure calling for his resignation you
can see in these pictures that you know
his rough patch hasn't gone his spirits
down dancing to a bit of Bob Marley
right there one love to think of a few
other Bob Marley songs he might like but
hey he's having a good time
